short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export your University of Waterloo class schedule directly from Quest.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply head over to "Academics" -> "Enroll" -> "My Class Schedule" and click on the "Download Schedule" button in the title. Be sure to be in "List View". Then you can import the .ics file into your preferred calendar application.
